body.title: Roadmap
body.text1:
A roadmap showing (most of) our stops along the way!
Join us while we're still growing!
body.text2:
As an open-source community and volunteer-driven project, our roadmap is not meant to show our future, but to show our progress along the way until right now!.
Since the spectrum of crypto tech and software is constantly changing, we might change lanes at any moment
body.text3: In the spirit of transparency and in good faith to the community, we want this roadmap to be made public.
